resources.string: Signing you out and closing app
App Developed By One Silicon Diode ;)

The TakeNotes folder should contain only images, check once!

Delete or Move Unsupported Files

PDF cannot be saved :(

In order to ensure privacy you need to sign in again

Privacy Policy

One Silicon Diode built the Take Notes app as an Open Source app. This SERVICE is provided by One Silicon Diode at no cost and is intended for use as is.

If you choose to use Take Notes, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. NO Data is ever sent, saved or stored in any form neither on the device nor online.

Contact Us
If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at connectwithspandan@gmail.com.
There were no images under the TakeNotes Folder\n\nSave the Image and Try Again!
Have a look at Take Notes
Choose app to share Take Notes
The easiest and fastest way to generate handwritten notes
Write almost anything on the real time paper
Adjust the spacing and lines according to your desired output
Choose from one of the already provided fonts, or upload one of your own!
Choose and tweak the page according to your choice
Structure your notes from the root
Get your magic wand ready, hit the button
Your notes are ready steaming hot!
Now that was a li\'ll obvious
You may switch between light/dark modes by tapping the button in top right corner
Remember, there is no alternative to handwritten notes\n\nThanks for downloading Take Notes
You can convert all image(s) inside your Take Notes folder into a single PDF file
Tap OCR!\nConvert all to text, just a tap.
